SENT.plain: Possible complications include orbital abscess, orbital cellulitis, intracranial complications
Inflammation with orbital and periorbital acute onset at newborn present to clinician as therapeutical dilemma
Pathogenic links which involve this process began from cellulitis to orbital abscess, cavernous sinus thrombosis, cerebral abscess, meningitis
We present 2 cases of rhinoethmoiditis at newborn with orbital cellulitis, with the main differential diagnostic problems and therapeutical options
